AND c.material_name LIKE '%${material}%'
AND a.default_number LIKE '%${defaultNumber}%'
AND a.oper_time >= #{startTime} AND #{endTime} >= a.oper_time
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id, a.material_id materialId, a.oper_number operNumber, a.m_unit_id mUnitId, CONVERT(a.unit_price, decimal(24, 2)) unitPrice, CONVERT(a.all_price, decimal(24, 2)) allPrice, a.remark, a.depot_id depotId, CONVERT(a.tax_unit_price, decimal(24, 2)) taxUnitPrice, CONVERT(a.tax_rate, decimal(24, 2)) taxRate, CONVERT(a.tax_money, decimal(24, 2)) taxMoney, IFNULL(SUM(b.oper_number * (CASE c.sub_type WHEN 10 THEN 0 WHEN 11 THEN 0 WHEN 12 THEN (CASE b.m_type WHEN 1 THEN -1 ELSE 1 END) WHEN 13 THEN (CASE b.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) WHEN 14 THEN (CASE WHEN a.depot_id = a.depot_id THEN -1 ELSE 1 END) ELSE CASE c.type WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE -1 END END)), 0) currentTock, CONVERT(a.tax_last_money, decimal(24, 2)) taxLastMoney FROM erp_depotitem a LEFT JOIN erp_depotitem b ON (b.depot_id = a.depot_id OR b.another_depot_id = a.depot_id) AND b.m_unit_id = a.m_unit_id AND b.header_id != a.header_id LEFT JOIN erp_depothead c ON c.id = b.header_id WHERE a.header_id = #{id} AND a.delete_flag = '0' GROUP BY a.id
